00035 CompactTriples::CompactTriples(Dictionary *dictionary, unsigned int ntriples, unsigned int parsing)
00036 {
00037     this->dictionary = dictionary;
00038     this->parsing = parsing;
00039     this->ntriples = 0;
00040     
00041     graph.resize(ntriples);

00044 CompactTriples::CompactTriples(Dictionary *dictionary, unsigned int ntriples, unsigned int parsing, string path)
00045 {
00046     this->dictionary = dictionary;
00047     this->ntriples = ntriples;

00052 CompactTriples::CompactTriples(Triples *other)
00053 {
00054     this->dictionary = other->getDictionary();
00055     this->parsing = other->getParsing();
00056     this->ntriples = other->size();
00057 }

00059 void
00060 CompactTriples::console()
00061 {
00062     vector<string> subcommand;
00063     string command;
00064     char commandChar[256] ;
00065     
00066     string format="ntriples";
00067     string output="salida.rdf";
00068     int i=0;
00069     
00070     
00071     cout.precision(4);
00072     cout << endl << "**************************" << endl;
00073     cout << "  Compact Triples Console" << endl;
00074     cout << "  ---------------------" << endl;
00075     
00076     while (true){
00077         format="ntriples";
00078         output="output.rdf";
00079         
00080         cout <<"  Available Operations: " << endl;
00081         cout <<"        serialize                      Serialize HDT to RDF (ntriples by default). " << endl;
00082         cout <<"            -f format                         Output format: ntriples (default), rdfxml, turtle, rdfxml-abbrev, rdfxml-xmp, atom, json-triples, json, dot"<< endl;  
00083         cout <<"            -o --output <file>                Serialize output (output.rdf by default)"<< endl; 
00084         cout <<"        help                           Show this help"<< endl;  
00085         cout <<"        exit                           Exit console mode"<< endl;   
00086     
00087         cout << "**************************" << endl;
00088         cout << endl;
00089         cout<<"\n\n$>";
00090 
00091         cin.getline(commandChar,256);
00092         command = commandChar;
00093         
00094         if (command=="")
00095             cout<<"\n Please provide one available command.\n\n";
00096         else
00097         {
00098             //split as space separator
00099             stringExplode(command, " ", &subcommand);
00100             
00101             if (subcommand[0]=="serialize"){ 
00102                 
00103                 for (i=1;i<subcommand.size();){
00104                     //verify arguments              
00105                     if (subcommand[i]=="-f"){
00106                         
00107                         i=i+1;
00108                         if (i<(subcommand.size())){
00109                             if (subcommand[i][0]!='-') //other option
00110                             {
00111                                 format = subcommand[i];
00112                                 if (format!="ntriples" && format!="turtle" && format!="rdfxml-xmp" && format!="rdfxml-abbrev"
00113                                     && format!="rdfxml" && format!="rss-1.0" && format!="atom" && format!="dot"
00114                                     && format!="rss-1.0" && format!="json-triples" && format!="json"){
00115                                     cout<<   "<WARNING> The format:"<<format<<" is possibly not allowed by the serializer.\n\n";
00116                                 } 
00117                                 i=i+1;
00118                             }   
00119                         }
00120                     }
00121                     else if(subcommand[i]=="-o"){
00122                         i=i+1;
00123                         if (i<(subcommand.size())){
00124                             if (subcommand[i][0]!='-') //other option
00125                             {
00126                                 output = subcommand[i];
00127                                 i=i+1;
00128                             }
00129                         }
00130                     }
00131                     else
00132                         i=i+1;
00133                         
00134                 }
00135                 DataTime t1, t2;        
00136                 getTime(&t1);
00137                 bool ok = serialize((char*)output.c_str(),(char*)format.c_str());
00138                 getTime(&t2);
00139                 if (ok)
00140                 {
00141                     cout << "   <OK> The file '" << output << " has been successfully created in ";
00142                     cout << t2.user - t1.user << " seconds." << endl <<  endl;
00143                 }
00144             }else if (subcommand[0]=="exit"){ 
00145                 exit(0);
00146                 }
00147             else if (subcommand[0]=="help"){
00148                 //nothing to do
00149             }
00150             else {
00151                 cout<<"\n"<<subcommand[0]<<": command not found.\n\n";
00152             }
00153         }
00154         subcommand.clear();
00155     }
00156 }
00157 
00158 bool
00159 CompactTriples::transformToN3()
00160 {
00161     unsigned int x = 1, y, z;
00162     size_t read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00163     string subject, predicate, object;
00164     TripleID triple;
00165     
00166     string input = path;
00167     FILE *fileY = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "r");
00168     
00169     input = path;
00170     FILE *fileZ = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "r");
00171     
00172     string output = path;
00173     output.append(".fromHDT.n3");
00174     ofstream outFile(output.c_str()); 
00175     
00176     unsigned int i = 1;
00177     
00178     while (i <= ntriples)
00179     {
00180         read_y += fread(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
00181         
00182         // Check if the current 'y' value marks (with 0) the end of an
00183         // adjacency list in X
00184         if (y == 0)
00185         {
00186             // Increment 'x' value and read a new 'y' value
00187             x++;
00188             read_y += fread(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
00189         }
00190         
00191         // Retrieve the adjacency list of (x,y)
00192         read_z += fread(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
00193         
00194         while (z != 0)
00195         {
00196             triple = retrieveTriple(x,y,z);
00197             
00198             subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00199             predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00200             object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00201             
00202             outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ." << endl;
00203             
00204             i++;
00205             read_z += fread(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
00206         }
00207     }
00208     
00209     return true;
00210 }
00211 
00212 bool
00213 CompactTriples::serialize(char *output, char *format)
00214 {
00215     unsigned int x = 1, y, z;
00216     RDFSyntaxMediator rdfmediator;
00217     ofstream outFile;
00218     
00219     bool n3=true;
00220     if (strcmp(format,"ntriples")!=0){
00221         n3=false;
00222         rdfmediator.init_serialize(output,format);
00223     }
00224     else
00225     {
00226         outFile.open(output); 
00227     }
00228     
00229     size_t read_y = 0, read_z = 0;
00230     string subject, predicate, object;
00231     TripleID triple;
00232     
00233     string input = path;
00234     FILE *fileY = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "r");
00235     
00236     input = path;
00237     FILE *fileZ = fopen((input.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "r");
00238     
00239     unsigned int i = 1;
00240     
00241     while (i <= ntriples)
00242     {
00243         read_y += fread(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
00244         
00245         // Check if the current 'y' value marks (with 0) the end of an
00246         // adjacency list in X
00247         if (y == 0)
00248         {
00249             // Increment 'x' value and read a new 'y' value
00250             x++;
00251             read_y += fread(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
00252         }
00253         
00254         // Retrieve the adjacency list of (x,y)
00255         read_z += fread(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
00256         
00257         while (z != 0)
00258         {
00259             triple = retrieveTriple(x,y,z);
00260             
00261             subject = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.x, VOC_SUBJECT);
00262             predicate = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.y, VOC_PREDICATE);
00263             object = dictionary->retrieveString(triple.z, VOC_OBJECT);
00264             
00265             //outFile 
00266             if (n3==true){
00267                 outFile << subject << " " << predicate << " " << object << " ." << endl;
00268             }
00269             else{
00270                 rdfmediator.serialize_statement(subject,predicate,object);
00271             }
00272             
00273             i++;
00274             read_z += fread(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
00275         }
00276     }
00277     
00278     if (n3==true){
00279         if (outFile.good()) outFile.close();
00280     }
00281     else
00282         rdfmediator.end_serialize();
00283         
00284     return true;
00285 }
00286 
00287 unsigned int 
00288 CompactTriples::write(vector<TripleID> &graph, string path)
00289 {
00290     string output = path;
00291     FILE *fileY = fopen((output.append(".hdt.triples.Y")).c_str(), "w+");
00292     
00293     output = path;
00294     FILE *fileZ = fopen((output.append(".hdt.triples.Z")).c_str(), "w+");
00295     
00296     unsigned int repeated = 0;
00297     unsigned int x = graph[0].x, y = graph[0].y, z = 0;
00298     
00299     fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
00300 
00301     for (unsigned int i=0; i<graph.size(); i++)
00302     {
00303         if (x == graph[i].x)
00304         {
00305             if (y == graph[i].y)
00306             {
00307                 if (z != graph[i].z)
00308                 {
00309                     z = graph[i].z;
00310                     fwrite(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
00311                 }
00312                 else
00313                 {
00314                     repeated++;
00315                 }
00316             }
00317             else
00318             {
00319                 // Change of Y coordinate: write a 0 in the stream Z
00320                 y = 0;
00321                 fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileZ);
00322                 
00323                 y = graph[i].y; z = graph[i].z;
00324                 
00325                 fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
00326                 fwrite(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
00327             }
00328         }
00329         else
00330         {
00331             // Change of X and Y coordinates: write both 0s in stream Y,Z
00332             x = 0; y = 0;
00333             
00334             fwrite(&x,INT32,1,fileY);
00335             fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileZ);
00336             
00337             x = graph[i].x; y = graph[i].y; z = graph[i].z;
00338             
00339             fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileY);
00340             fwrite(&z,INT32,1,fileZ);
00341         }
00342     }
00343     
00344     x = 0; fwrite(&x,INT32,1,fileY);
00345     y = 0; fwrite(&y,INT32,1,fileZ);
00346     
00347     fclose(fileY);
00348     fclose(fileZ);
00349     
00350     return graph.size()-repeated;
00351 }   
00352 
00353 unsigned int 
00354 CompactTriples::write(string path)
00355 {   
00356     return CompactTriples::write(this->graph, path);
00357 }
